text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

text: Free software is a matter of liberty, not price.
author: Richard Stallman

text: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

text: Simplicity is the soul of efficiency.
author: Austin Freeman

text: Before software can be reusable it first has to be usable.
author: Ralph Johnson

text: Work hard until you don't have to introduce yourself.
author: Ankith Khaitan

text: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
author: Alan Kay

text: In web development, speed isn't just technical - it's ethical.
author: Alex Russell

text: Speed is a feature. Rigorously prioritize performance.
author: Addy Osmani

text: The most efficient code is the code that never runs.
author: Kyle Simpson
